result.markdown:
# Keyword Groups {#sec-keygroups}



## Provider Data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
prov_identifier_url <- function(x) {
  
  paste0(
    "https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/",
    "api/1/datastore/query/", 
    x, 
    "/0")
}
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
catalog_provider <- \() {
  
  dataset <- as_tbl(
    fload(
      "https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/api/1/metastore/schemas/dataset/items"
    ) |>
      mtt(
        issued      = as_date(issued),
        modified    = as_date(modified),
        released    = as_date(released),
        keyword     = flatten_column(keyword),
        theme       = flatten_column(theme),
        description = trimws(sf_remove(description, "\n")),
        describedBy = paste0(
          "https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/",
          identifier,
          "#data-dictionary"
        )
      )
  )
    add_vars(
      dataset,
      downloadURL = delist(get_elem(dataset$distribution, "downloadURL", DF.as.list = TRUE)),
      contact = glue(
        '{delist(get_elem(dataset$contactPoint, "fn"))} ',
        '({delist(get_elem(dataset$contactPoint, "^has", regex = TRUE))})')
      # contact_fn = delist(get_elem(dataset$contactPoint, "fn")),
      # contact_pt = delist(get_elem(dataset$contactPoint, "^has", regex = TRUE))
      ) |> 
      slt(
        title,
        theme,
        description,
        keyword,
        issued,
        modified,
        released,
        identifier,
        dictionary = describedBy,
        downloadurl = downloadURL,
        contact,
        landing = landingPage
      ) |> 
      roworder(theme, title) |> 
      rsplit(~ theme) |> 
      set_names(
        c(
          "dialysis_facilities",
          "doctors_and_clinicians",
          "home_health_services",
          "hospice_care",
          "hospitals",
          "inpatient_rehabilitation_facilities",
          "long_term_care_hospitals",
          "nursing_homes",
          "physician_office_visit_costs",
          "supplier_directory"
        )
      )
}

prov <- catalog_provider()

prov
```

### Hospitals

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
prov$hospitals |> 
  pull(title) |> 
  utils::formatOL() |> 
  writeLines()
```

#### Possible Subgroups

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
filter(
  prov$hospitals, 
  stri_detect_regex(
    title, 
    "Quality Measures - |Quality Measure Data - "
    ))
```

## Main Data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dataset <- as_tbl(
    fload("https://data.cms.gov/data.json", query = "/dataset") |>
      slt(
        title,
        theme,
        keyword,
        description,
        periodicity = accrualPeriodicity,
        modified,
        temporal,
        distribution,
        identifier,
        contact = contactPoint,
        dictionary = describedBy,
        landingPage,
        references
      ) |>
      mtt(
        modified = as_date(modified),
        periodicity = recode_iso8601(periodicity),
        keyword = flatten_column(keyword),
        theme = flatten_column(theme),
        description = trimws(sf_remove(description, "\n")),
        references = delist(references)
      )
  ) |>
    roworder(title)

dataset
```
